Summary: Orange UFO!!!! 2 Night in a row!
trends: There has been one other sighting in Grant
There was one other sighting in Grant on or around April 11th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at my friends house when we saw what looked like an orange star. It moved to the left and right dimming and lighting up. It then moved out of view and we did not see it again. This is the second night in a row we seen this!
